1.text: Pull apart the first bobby pin so that it is a long, flat metal piece.

2.text: Use the lock to bend the tip of your pin into a pick.
2.vid: /9/9d/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 2 Version 7.360p.mp4

3.text: Bend one end of the pick into a handle.
3.vid: /a/af/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Create your lever by bending a whole bobby pin into a right angle.
4.vid: /9/9e/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Visualize the inside of the lock to understand how picking works.
5.vid: /c/c3/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Insert your lever into the bottom half of the lock.
6.vid: /6/6d/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 6 Version 7.360p.mp4

7.text: Turn the lock lightly in the direction you would use to open it.
7.vid: /c/cb/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 7 Version 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Insert your pick, bent side up, and feel for the pins.
8.vid: /4/46/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 8 Version 7.360p.mp4

9.text: Find your first "seized," or difficult to move, pin and push it up until it clicks.
9.vid: /9/98/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Find and repeat on the rest of the seized pins.
10.vid: /f/ff/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 10 Version 7.360p.mp4

11.text: Adjust the tension on your lever if you're having difficulty.
11.vid: /f/f6/Pick a Lock with a Bobby Pin Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4
